name: Sword + Shield = A Warrior
description:
Made during the "Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1", it gave me this silly idea where two warriors, with one arm each, could cooperate together in order to be a "complete" warrior.

So in this experience, you will have to wield two warriors in real time. Moreover apart from beating the enemies, there is no real "goal".

- Inputs (Gamepad controller is recommended):

* Movement Character Green => ZQSD or WASD on Key // Left stick on Gamepad

* Movement Character Pink => IJKL on Key // Right stick on Gamepad

* Revive character dead (aim their belly) => Hold E Key with Green &  Hold O Key with Pink // A button on the Gamepad for both

* Dash action => Ctrl Left on Key // LB on Gamepad for Green & Spacebar Key // RB on Gamepad for Pink

* Sword action of Green => X key // LT on Gamepad

* Shield action of Pink => N key // RT on Gamepad

- Credits - SFX: From the GDC Bundles of Soniss => https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc
